alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 1:43PM MDT until November 06 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 MPH late this afternoon, decreasing to 40 to 50 MPH tonight and Sunday morning. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of snow and blowing snow will create near whiteout conditions. Hikers, hunters and snow mobilers could easily become disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
